page_content: Discusses the installation of information boards and interactive elements for the tenth Solothurn forest walk aimed at educating the public about the Emme habitat.
Describes a geological hiking trail around Bärschwil, featuring information boards on geological peculiarities.
Provides information on the requirements for waste disposal, including permits for disposing of contaminated materials.
Celebrates the 150th anniversary of the Juragewässerkorrektion, a major water management project affecting several cantons.
Discusses the introduction of an Integral Integration Model aimed at economic, linguistic, and social integration in the Canton of Solothurn.
Provides information on the status and work permissions of individuals who have been provisionally admitted to Switzerland.
Announces the Solothurn Entrepreneur Award ceremony, highlighting the nominees and the focus on regional businesses.
